expertiseDomains.expertise: Anais Abdel Sattar is a senior associate and an expert in contractual law matters. She is very experienced in litigation and arbitration in commercial matters.

Anaïs advises private and corporate clients on domestic and international litigation and arbitration, including pre-trial strategy, in civil and commercial matters, including banking litigation. Her sectors of expertise encompass employment, real estate, corporate and contract matters. She has successfully prosecuted numerous cases of cross-border service agreements in the airline and IT sectors.

 She also assists clients with the enforcement of foreign and national decisions and arbitral awards through asset tracing and recovery, civil seizures of assets and recognition proceedings.

Anaïs regularly advises entrepreneurs, companies and private clients on the negotiation and drafting of commercial contracts, including manufacturing, distribution, licensing, joint venture, franchise, lease, service, sale and purchase agreements, both in international and domestic matters. She has particular experience in the automobile, transportation and hospitality industries.

 Anaïs also assists clients with business ownership transfer processes.
Anaïs regularly advises clients in all corporate law matters as well as in day-to-day business matters, including in employment law and tenancy law.
Anaïs frequently assists creditors with the recovery of their claims in the matter of debt collection and bankruptcy proceedings as well as related litigations.
